description: Explore Lisbon's iconic viewpoints and historic monuments in Alfama and Belém, ending with nightlife in Bairro Alto.

items.summary: Classic tiled viewpoint over Alfama rooftops.
Panoramic Lisbon skyline, best at sunset.
UNESCO Gothic monastery, ornate cloisters.
Iconic fortress on the Tagus River.
Narrow streets full of bars & nightlife.

description: Journey to Europe's westernmost point and discover hidden beaches along the stunning Portuguese coast.

items.summary: Westernmost point of Europe, dramatic cliffs.
Hidden wild beach with sea stacks (steep hike down).
Elegant beach town with marina & old town.
Central Ericeira beach, good for sunsets.

description: Immerse yourself in Ericeira's world-class surf culture with pristine beaches and oceanfront dining.

items.summary: World-class surf break & surf reserve.
Rugged surf cove with natural rock pools.
Sandy beach at river mouth, calmer water.
Oceanfront bar, great for cocktails at sunset.

description: Experience the wild Atlantic coast at Guincho Beach and savor fresh seafood at local favorites.

items.summary: Windswept surf beach near Cascais.
Local spot famous for fresh fish & lobster.

description: Discover legendary surf spots and witness giant wave culture from Peniche to Nazaré.

items.summary: Lighthouse & cliffs facing Berlengas Islands.
Legendary surf spot with tubular waves.

items.nameLocal: Farol da Nazaré / Forte de São Miguel Arcanjo
items.summary: Big-wave lookout & surf museum.
Scenic cable car linking beach & Sítio clifftop.

description: Hike coastal hills, relax in sheltered bays, and explore historic Gothic monasteries.

items.summary: Short hike with 360° coastal & inland views.

items.nameLocal: Baía de São Martinho do Porto
items.summary: Sheltered shell-shaped bay, calm swimming.
Gothic abbey with royal tombs.

description: Begin your Douro Valley adventure with scenic drives and prestigious port wine estates.

items.summary: Scenic river road with terraced vineyards.
Historic port estate, tours & tastings.
Panoramic vineyard walks & tastings.

description: Experience the heart of port wine country with panoramic viewpoints and riverside cruises in Pinhão.

items.nameLocal: Miradouro de São Leonardo de Galafura
items.summary: Classic Douro panorama praised by poet Torga.
Modern winery with sweeping views.
Start point for rabelo boat cruises.
Overlooks Pinhão bend in the river.

description: Adventure to Portugal's tallest waterfalls and climb the baroque steps of Lamego's sanctuary.

items.summary: 10 km hike to Portugal's tallest cascades.

items.nameLocal: Santuário de Nossa Senhora dos Remédios
items.summary: Baroque church with 686 steps.

description: Arrive in Madeira and discover the unique world of fortified Madeira wines in historic Funchal.

items.summary: Learn & taste Madeira fortified wines.

description: Explore Madeira's dramatic eastern peninsula with volcanic cliffs, hidden beaches, and coastal trails.

items.nameLocal: Vereda da Ponta de São Lourenço (PR8)
items.summary: Coastal trail with volcanic cliffs & ocean views.
Wide cliffside viewpoint over peninsula.
Small hidden black-sand cove.
Town beach with golden imported sand.

description: Conquer Madeira's highest peaks with sunrise views above the clouds and mountain hiking.

items.summary: Drive-up peak with sunrise above the clouds.
Madeira's highest mountain, 1862 m.
Alternate shorter route to Pico Ruivo.

description: Immerse yourself in Funchal's culture with markets, gardens, and the famous Monte toboggan ride.

items.summary: Exotic fruits, spices & fish hall.
Scenic ride up to Monte.
Exotic gardens & azulejo tiles.
Wicker basket sled ride downhill.
16th-century Gothic church.

description: Journey through Madeira's wild north coast with ancient forests, natural pools, and dramatic waterfalls.

items.summary: Plateau viewpoint above the clouds.
Misty UNESCO forest with ancient laurel trees.
Lava rock pools filled by the ocean.
Slender cascade off sea cliffs.
Black-sand beach framed by cliffs.
Colorful boats & poncha bars.

description: Discover Madeira's southwest coast with golden beaches, cascading waterfalls, and lighthouse sunsets.

items.summary: Artificial golden-sand beach, calm waters.
Waterfall that falls onto the road.
Deep gorge with 140m waterfall.
Westernmost lighthouse, sunset spot.

description: Experience Madeira's famous levada trail to magical waterfalls and Europe's highest sea cliff.

items.summary: Famous waterfall & spring-fed lagoon hike.
Shuttle & starting point for levadas.
Glass walkway on Europe's highest sea cliff.

description: Escape to Porto Santo's golden sandy paradise and explore the peaceful neighboring island.

items.nameLocal: Piscinas Naturais do Porto das Salemas
items.summary: Remote tide pools at low tide.
9 km long golden sand beach.
Small main town with cafes & shops.

description: Enjoy your final day in Funchal's charming old town with colorful streets and souvenir shopping.

items.summary: Painted doors, bars, and final souvenir shopping.

description: Departure day - return rental car and catch your flight from Madeira's Cristiano Ronaldo Airport.

items.summary: 20 min from Funchal, rental car return.
